title: Tools
content:
All Tools

Name Description Effects Backpack A simple canvas bag, perfect for carrying almost anything Effect goes here Camp Supply Sack Small compartments line the sack; a compass-sized furrow; a pocket packed with storing salts; and an area for stuff tent legs. fixing pegs, and folded canvas Stores your camp supplies. Alchemy Pouch A patina of puce alchemical matter coats this pouch- hopefully not the former owner reduced to dust by thei experiments. Stores your ingredients and extracts. Hamme
